title: Death monster visits UK roads on New Year's Eve, kidnapping ...
text:
(MENAFN)

British authorities announced on Wednesday that during the New Year festivities, a series of unfortunate fatal crashes on the highways of Britain caused death of at least six people over yesterday.



At nearly 6:30 p.m. (1830 GMT), a driver crashed a 62-year-old woman with his motor while she was walking around using her scooter celebrating the New Year vibes in Cannock, West Midlands.



Few minutes before the midnight, 26 km from London, specifically at Stanwell , a collision between a heavy-Goods-Vehicle and a car boarded by 4 people leaded to the death of three of them at their 20s and the injury of a woman at her 25 age.



Once the New Year began, a crash accident with a tree killed a 37-year-old man in the West Midlands.



Another death case of 59-year-old man was recorded at the same time in Manchester due to a collision between 2 cars
